contacts.abstract: Feel free to get in touch with me. I am always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas or opportunities to be part of your visions.
contacts.subtitle: Don't be Shy!
contacts.title: Get in Touch
portfolio.title: My
who_am_i: I am a Senior Frontend Developer and UI/UX Designer with a strong passion for creating intuitive and visually engaging digital experiences. With years of experience in designing and developing interfaces, I strive to combine functionality and aesthetics to deliver modern and user-friendly solutions.
